_header: But yhene of them oft with them to meet / For all seem they

SionArcL402E25.First Lines:
Bot yhene of þam oft with þam to meteffor all seme
                    þai bittir þai ar swete…
SionArcL402E25.Last Lines:
…Bot þe loue of god þat es cleneOf worldly luf
                    þat here es sene
